about_the_game:
A fantasy story full of magic and intrigue that will transport you to a different time and place. Ranger Quest is a 2D top down adventure game that combines exploration with the puzzle aspects of a maze. A modern game that incorporates pixel art to create the nostalgia of an 80’s era top down adventure game.


No adventure would be complete without doors to open and rooms to explore. Navigate through the maze to find the elemental orbs and the pieces of the magic map. With each orb you find, more of the maze will open up for you to search.


Activate shrines and be transported between floors. Only by moving back and forth between floors will you be able to find the correct path and solve the puzzle.

The Minotaur Maze Engine takes a classic 2D Maze and reinvents it by having the walls move. A game designed to be enjoyable and challenging for players of all ages. For anyone who has enjoyed the simple pleasure of completing a maze at some point in their lives. The Minotaur Maze Engine brings the classic maze into the 21st century.
Developed with the Godot game engine.
Music and sound effects obtained from ZapSplat.
The Minotaur Maze Engine. The maze where the walls move.

name: Ranger Quest: The Adventure Begins

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8 or newer
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: The adventure begins by navigating your way through the Sanctuary of the Orbs. A mysterious quest, the elemental orbs lying in wait for the ranger to claim and an ancient map to be remade. The Sanctuary of the Orbs is no ordinary building as the corridors twist and turn like a maze.
